cause.description:
As this country has evolved, we have seen more and more cases where the first amendment freedoms have been violated. The most recent incidence of this was the "Bong Hits 4 Jesus" case that went all the way to the supreme court, where the ruling was 5-4 that a school could diminish a students right to free speech if the student was promoting something that was contrary to the school's mission.
1. Every human deserves the rights that are protected under the Constitution
2. The federal government should not have the power to limit these rights however they deem necessary
cause.mission: Ensure that the government does not infringe upon our Constituional rights
cause.name: Protect our Freedoms
